Title: The Vehm (No. 132)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Vincent Angell, Brandon Margolis (executive story editor), Brandon Sonnier (executive story editor), Brian Studler (executive story editor)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Ryan Eggold
Plot: A rare medieval device is used in a murder, prompting Red to warn the task force that a lethal vigilante group from the Middle Ages is now in operation. Meanwhile, Liz receives startling news and cautiously plans her next move.
